dotnetType.name: BytesSchemaBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.ByteArrayResolution" />.

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.BytesSchema" /> build result if <paramref name="resolution" />
            is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.ByteArrayResolution" />; an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" />
            build result otherwise.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BytesSchemaBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Abstract.SchemaBuilderCase
